title: Her Favorite Daddy
description: He was older.Wore his money on his wrist.Just a fun fling at a bar to start her summer off right.But the very next day, Mia finds him standing at the altar. And heâ€™s about to marry her mother.Could her life be any worse? The answer is yes. He was going to make it hell.**Her Favorite Daddy is a fun and dark novella with the heat turned up high and danger lurking around the corner. Content warning for cheating, explicit scenes, moral ambiguity, and violence. This book is for readers 18+**First book in the "Mia Thornton" series. (Previously titled "Her Favorite")
author: Magdalin Laine
